title: Valentine's Day Gifts
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 80L
description: Valentine's Day is full of excitement and gifts. In the story Valentine's Day Gifts, students will get to read about a selection of different gifts to celebrate Valentine's Day. The colorful pictures will help students identify the main idea and details as well as visualize to understand the text.
meta: balloons, chocolates, cookies, flowers, gifts, valentine
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /v/ sound
Plural Nouns : Recognize and use plural nouns
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word the
